resources.string: Click and hold the power button whenever needed.This app will send location details to your desired contacts
Application is sending location information to your contacts..
Set the alert message ,Eg. I am in danger!
Do the following in order to use app in emergency
1.Hold the volume down button until mobile goes in vibrate mode.
2.Then immediately (within 1 second) volume up till mobile is in Ringer mode again.
3.Location details alongwith the message you saved earlier will be sent to all your saved conatacts
